Package sudoku.ui.action

Class Summary
About Displays About the game and its authors
CheckProgress The purpose of this class is to check to see if a player has made a mistake in the placement of a guess.
ChoosePuzzle Action to choos a puzzles.
Clear Listens for the clear event in Menu, the button
Connect Connects client to server.
Cozener Listens for the Cozener action which is ctrl-m gives the user the answers.
Exit Exits the game
HowTo Displays the rules of the game.
Options Display player options and allows them to be modified.
Pause Action that pauses game play.
Print Listens for the clear event in Menu, the button
Redo Action to redo any previous undone actions.
Resume Brings the game from a paused state to game in progress.
Start Changes the game state from WAITING_FOR_PLAYERS to GAME_IN_PROGRESS.
StartComputerPlayer Starts a computer player instance.
Undo The action for undoing actions.
